Name: Food Fight
About the game: Food Fight is a retro top-down 2D shooter inspired by games from the mid 80s and 90s. You play as Coco the Muffin who, after his town split up, goes into hiding along with his girlfriend. However, after his girlfriend gets taken away, he will do anything to avenge her...but to what end. Defeat every boss, upgrade your weapons, and claim victory to anyone that stands in your way.
